document.full_text: protests erupted across syria against the rule of president bashar al-assad on friday and sources said 22 people were killed in the southern city of deraa, the cradle of the unrest.
document.title: pro-democracy protests sweep syria, 22 killed
lines_and_colors: protests erupted across syria against the rule of president bashar al-assad on friday and sources said 22 people were killed in the southern city of deraa, the cradle of the unrest.
